noPlayer: ❗ There is no active player in this server.
notInVoiceChannel: ❗ You need to join a voice channel to use this interaction.
notConnected: ❗ You’re not connected to <#{{channelId}}> to use these interactions.
noRequestToSpeak: ❗ I don’t have **REQUEST TO SPEAK** permission in <#{{channelId}}> and is unable to speak.
noQuery: ❗ Provide a search query or URL to play something.
queueEmpty: ❗ The queue is empty right now.
noTrack: ❗ There are no tracks in the queue.
noPrevious: ❗ There are no previous tracks in the queue.
noSource: ❗ The source "{{source}}" isn’t available. Try another one.
noLyrics: ❗ Lyrics could not be found for this track.
invalidSeekFormat: ❗ Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
beyondDuration: ❗ You can’t seek beyond the track duration of {{duration}}.
notReplayable: ❗ This track can’t be replayed because it isn’t seekable.
invalidTrackNumber: ❗ Enter a valid index that does not exceed the queue length.
joinedChannel: Bot has joined the voice channel <#{{channelId}}>.
leftChannel: Bot has left the voice channel.
addTrack: Added {{track}} to the queue at position `{{position}}`.
addPlaylist: Added `{{size}}` tracks from `{{title}}` to the queue.
selectTrack: Choose the track you want to play.
noFile: ❗ Attach an audio file to play.
invalidFormat: ❗ Supported formats: MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC, or M4A.
corruptedFile: ❗ Couldn’t play the audio file; it may be corrupted.
title: Title
author: Author
stopped: Stopped the player and cleared the queue.
removeTrack: Removed {{track}} from the queue at position {{number}}.
